mainBanner.title: Explore the Rugged Kyrgyz Landscapes on Motorbike
mainBanner.description: Experience the thrill of riding through the breathtaking mountains and valleys of Kyrgyzstan on our powerful motorbikes

aboutUsBlock.takingRidesTitle: Taking rides to a never level
aboutUsBlock.description: We believe in taking your riding experience to the next level. Get ready for scenic views, rugged terrains, and the thrill of riding through some of the most stunning landscapes on the planet.

tours.title: Tours
tours.desc: Routes for any type of tour
